project.teaser: Impact Monitor is a proposal to deliver a coherent and holistic framework and toolbox that aim to become the reference choice for technology and policy assessment of the environmental-, economic- and societal-impact of European aviation R&I. Bolstered by its profound...
project.objective: Impact Monitor is a proposal to deliver a coherent and holistic framework and toolbox that aim to become the reference choice for technology and policy assessment of the environmental-, economic- and societal-impact of European aviation R&I. Bolstered by its profound knowledge and multidisciplinary expertise, a consortium consisting of 10 research establishments and academic institutes develop this framework and toolbox by advancing credible and successfully-applied approaches beyond state of the art. In particular, Impact Monitor rests on and advances the approaches used in EC Better Regulation guidelines and toolbox and in the EC projects TEAM_Play, Clean Sky TE, and AGILE/AGILE 4.0. Further, capabilities of the framework and toolbox are demonstrated through three use cases addressing exemplary innovations in European aviation R&I, and are made accessible to educate students and broader community via “Impact Monitor Academy”.
project.title: Impact Monitor
project.keywords: Aircraft Design, Impact Assessment, R&I Initiatives, Clean Sky, Digitalization

result.title: Plan for Dissemination & Exploitation including communication activities
result.description: A tailored plan will be elaborated at the beginning of the project and will be updated during the project’s life cycle.

result.title: Data Management Plan (Issue 2)
result.description: Updated final version of the DMP - Data management methodology for all data sets that will be handled throughout the project

result.title: Data Management Plan (Issue 1)
result.description: Data management methodology for all data sets that will be handled throughout the project. First version of the document.

result.title: Impact Monitor Toolbox
result.description: This deliverable will be an updated and refined version of D1.1, providing the final version of the Impact Monitor Toolbox

result.title: Delivery of final Dashboard Application version (tool + documentation) with utility and capability demonstrated
result.description: This deliverable will provide the final version of the tool with required documentation for usage and all required and fully functional capabilities. It will also include illustrated results from the selected use case to demonstrate the capability of the DA.

result.title: Extension of standard data format covering all assessment levels
result.description: the standard data format is extended with this deliverable, addressing the aircraft, airport and ATS levels.

result.title: Communication Pack & Channels
result.description: The project logo, poster, leaflet, templates, website, and social media pages will be created.

result.title: Use Cases Framework Implementation
result.description: The deliverable will consist in the setup of all the use cases in the collaborative framework developed in WP3

result.title: Use Cases results
result.description: The deliverable will present the finalized demonstrator use cases, and highlight the remaining developments required to enable a full deployment of the collaborative framework

result.title: Periodic Reporting for period 1 - Impact Monitor (Impact Monitor)
result.teaser: The Impact Monitor project aimed to develop a coherent and holistic impact assessment framework and toolbox to support in making informed, science-based decisions for the technology and policy assessment of the environmental, economic, and societal impacts of European aviation...

category.title: Report Summary
category.description: Result: Publishable summary (FP7 SESAM) and Summary for publication (H2020 SyGMa)

result.title: Use Cases definition
result.description: The deliverable will present the initial requirements and specifications of all the UCs coming from the three streams

result.title: Final Communication & Dissemination Report & Project legacy pack
result.description: Report on the dissemination and communication activities performed throughout the project. Informative material presenting the results to be used by all partners in events after the end of the project.

result.title: Final version of the Collaborative Assessment Framework (finalized and documented, including trainings and workshop material)
result.description: the last release of the Collaborative Assessment Framework is delivered by WP3, including supporting material

category.title: Digital agenda
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development of digital technologies and the digitisation of the economy and society (known as ‘Digital transition’).

category.title: Clean air
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the clean air policy (National Emission Ceiling Directive) aiming to improve ambient air quality and tackle air pollution, to protect the environment and human health.

category.title: Artificial intelligence
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development and deployment of AI-based technologies and solutions. Projects that develop AI-tools as part of their research method are included

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversity
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to Europe’s biodiversity’s path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.
